dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathyanshayata anubaddha simasahitha si-nor padaname sewaka sewikawange hinga watup lesa rupiyal laksha 600ka mudalak gewimata piyawaragena atha.wasara 1998 sita aya-waya yojanawangen wadi kala rajya sewaka watup methek owunta nisi lesa himi wi nothibunu athara ema hinga watup mudala nila washayen si - nor sewaka sewikawanta piri namima dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahathage pradhanathwayen ema niyojya amathi sarath kumara gunarathna mahathage sahabhagithwayen sidu kerini.gewi giya wasara 16ka pamana kalak mema aayathanaye sewaka sewikawanta nisi lesa watup gewima ho artha sadhaka mudal gewima da sidu kara nothibunu athara atham wasarawala miliyana 30 da ikma wu alabhayak wartha wi thibuni.dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahatha dhiwara amathya dhuraye katayuthu arambaimen pasu kumar da silwa mahathage sahabhagithwayen ha ehi pradhaninge kapawimen krama kramayen paduwa awama kara ganimata haki wu athara nawa sanwardhana wyapruthi rasakage sarthakathwayen pasugiya wasare di labha labimata arambaima siduwi thibe.
